title: Report debris and litter on motorways and main roads

details.description: Reporting obstructions or debris on trunk roads, A roads, major routes, motorways across the UK - phone numbers
details.body:
If you see debris or an obstruction on an A road or motorway in England, Scotland or Wales, report it by phone.

Never use your mobile phone while driving.

Motorways and main roads

Highways Agency (England)
0300 123 5000
24 hours, 7 days a week

Traffic Scotland
0800 028 1414
24 hours, 7 days a week

Traffic Wales
0845 602 6020
24 hours, 7 days a week

In Northern Ireland, contact the Department for Regional Development

Local roads

Report litter and debris and abandoned vehicles to your local council.
